Image.name: Image
Image.description: Represents the details of an image.

AlternateText.description: Accessibility text to explain the image in words.

CapturedAngle.description: Angle at which the image was captured.

ContentDocumentId.description: Unique identifier of the content document where image is stored.

ImageClassObjectType.description: The type of image. Used in Einstein Object Detection to identify whether the image is used to detect objects or build a model.

IsActive.description: Indicates if an image is active. The default value is False. An active image can be used for building or updating a model in Einstein Object Detection.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date on which the image was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date on which the image was last viewed.

OwnerId.description: Unique identifier of the record owner.

Url.description: Public URL of the image file.
